entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Lévis
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.9°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 74 %

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Blowing snow. Amount 5 cm over northern sections. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
